reference.title: Forced re-enrollment
reference.shortdesc: Specifies whether ChromeOS devices are forced to re-enroll into your account after theyâ€™ve been wiped. By default, wiped devices automatically re-enroll into your account without users having to enter their username and password. setting values are: (1.) Force device to automatically re-enroll after wiping (2.) Force device to re-enroll with user credentials after wiping (3.) Device is not forced to re-enroll after wiping
